pageContext.claim: “Nobody ever reports that, but we won the Senate and we picked up two seats, which is -- you know, someday one of you guys are going to get out and actually report that....But we won the Senate, and people were very surprised at how well we did in the Senate. We almost won three additional seats that we weren't expected to be anywhere near.”
pageContext.analysis: Republicans retaining control of the Senate was widely reported on election night, but it was less of a news story because it was expected. Democrats faced a difficult map in the Senate in 2018, with many red state Democrats up for reelection in states that Trump won handily. The results were not much of a surprise, and the Democrat in Florida only narrowly lost his seat after a hand recount.
